Stephen, sorry for the importunity, can I ask a few more questions? 
Talking about asp net core app, is it true that IO operation continuation will always be on IOCP thread, so we won't decrease responsiveness of whole web app? 
Is there any potential danger in using Task.WhenAll in asp net applications? For example if we run multiple IO operations (using WhenAll) on EVERY http request does it decrease overall app scalability?
Thank you for your answers!
